description.en: Middle third of the Horizontal Triptych layout. Swedish cannons discharge in unison, flames and smoke bursting outward. Gunners cover their ears or brace against the recoil. Musket volleys follow from the infantry line beyond, creating a wall of light and sound.

narration.en: Cannon and musket — a single, deafening heartbeat of defiance.

info: Page 8 – Counterfire Ordered. PageType: 3. Scene (panel 2): Swedish artillery and infantry unleash coordinated fire.
